feed.title: SiYuan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve details
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Improve refreshing of doc tree when creating doc
  • The backlink panel supports hoving block icon to open floating windows
  • Adapt PWA title bar color
  • Improve the ghosting of list items
  • Improve attribute search and highlighting
  • Improve performance for listing doc tree
  • Browser clipping extension supports removing image link
  • Add icon for primary key of database binding block
  • Deleting the spaces between the images will result in a line break
  • Improve mouse selection blocks

Bugfix

  • Tag search not escaped correctly

Refactor

  • Upgrade to Electron v33.4.0

Development

  • Emit bus paste event for pasteText as well
  • Improve font size CSS and list item pseudo-element layout

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve details
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Support disabling ==foo== inline mark syntax
  • Improve dock panel popup
  • Improve Firefox compatibility
  • Improve text appearance setting
  • Improve pasting of virtual ref content
  • Some S3 providers are not available
  • Improve exit focus positioning
  • Improve database date field relative between filter
  • Improve block custom attribute search preview area positioning
  • Improve local file link pasting

Development

  • Add parameter nodeElement to protyleSlash.callback

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve details
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • The entry block icon cannot be clicked after the database is centered or right-aligned
  • Hide text in breadcrumb of last non-document path in embed block
  • Improve code/kbd/tag element editing
  • Deduplicate container block backlink
  • Improve positioning of table and recent block searches
  • AI writing supports custom shortcut keys
  • Improve positioning after exiting focus
  • Improve the window control button position after the graph panel is full screen
  • Improve the centering and line wrapping of database primary key emojis
  • Insert list reference when dragging multiple docs into the editor
  • Double click .search__drag to restore default width
  • Improve dynamic loading
  • Improve RTL rendering
  • Improve find-replace of image/link elements
  • Remove <br> in the document title
  • Supports table copy in read-only mode
  • Hide the network image icon in the inbox
  • Improve database date field relative between filter
  • Expand doc tree after moving from inbox
  • Click inside the table to hide the toolbar
  • Convert ref to text only when sharing to the community
  • Improve backmention highlighting
  • Improve opening links in Attribute panel - Database
  • Improve browser clipping extension
  • Improve block reference count refreshing
  • Improve menu pasting
  • Switch content blocks LTR RTL layout supports custom shortcut keys
  • Improve heading block copy and paste
  • Improve code block parsing
  • Improve asset src decoding when importing markdown
  • Expand doc tree after duplicating doc
  • Improve marketplace theme update
  • Change the kernel to background tasks on HarmonyOS Next
  • /menu add kbd element
  • Set the auth code via environment variable
  • Refresh virtual reference cache after doc convert to heading
  • Set the workspace path and lang via environment variable
  • Update outline after rolling back document
  • Improve appearance mode switch
  • Pasting text with a > in the middle no longer creates a blockquote block
  • Display reference counts after unfolding headings
  • Improve find-replace of text containing escape characters
  • The size limit of inserted assets has been adjusted from 4G to 8G

Bugfix

  • Inline code exceptions on Windows 10
  • The attribute panel relation field is abnormal
  • Wrong process name
  • Lacks the entry to edit mermaid on mobile
  • Scrollbar style is incorrect
  • Relative paths are constructed from a wrong basedir when importing markdown folder
  • Rollback document exception after moving document
  • Font folder not packaged on macOS/Linux/Windows arm64
  • Unable to download online video
  • dragover__bottom class name not removed

Refactor

  • Upgrade to Graphviz v3.11.0
  • Upgrade to Electron v33.4.1

Development

  • Improve kernel API exportMdContent

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve details
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Support opening a block in a new tab via shortcut keys
  • Improve tooltip
  • Support preview fonts
  • Improve creating sub-doc by F3
  • Improve browser clipping extension
  • Improve inline elements editing
  • Improve pasting of heading blocks
  • Improve database date field relative between filter
  • Attribute Panel - Database - Date field popup window abnormal
  • Improve the stability of WeChat SiYuan Assistant
  • Improve Ctrl+K to paste a hyperlink
  • Remove zero-width spaces around image nodes when exporting Markdown
  • Supports document tree related settings on mobile

Bugfix

  • Drag and drop image with PDF file open makes backspace unusable
  • Cannot long press to paste on mobile devices
  • Deleted documents cannot be rolled back
  • Block attributes display abnormal emoji

Refactor

  • Refactor the protyle mouseover event
  • Upgrade to Electron v33.4.2
  • Refactor setCurrent func scroll policy

Development

  • Add data-id attribute to the buttons

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve details
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Remove zero-width spaces from empty paragraph blocks
  • Improve preview style
  • Improve marketplace package loading
  • Multiple selection cells in the table support copying plain text
  • Use html-to-image to replace html2canvs
  • Improve width submenu in block menu
  • Improve the rendering of the block icon position of the list block
  • Font size supports relative settings
  • Merge the same elements after find-replace
  • Improve outline jump positioning
  • Text with appearance after input keeps its appearance
  • Pin the floating window after scaling
  • Improve reconnection prompt after switching apps on iOS
  • The Export in the asset menu on the mobile is changed to calling the browser to download
  • Improve element menu on mobile
  • Improve chart edit rendering
  • Improve anchor text escaping when creating a subdoc by reference
  • Marketplace search for multiple keywords uses AND logic
  • Improve block ref dynamic anchor text to add inline level style
  • Block icon are not displayed in certain cases
  • The database supports creating new entries after pressing Tab at the end of the cell
  • Copying a database cell and pasting it into the doc title only pastes plain text
  • Improve database multiple selection and relation field cell pop-up editing
  • Improve switching of database cells or pop-up options via arrow keys
  • Improve browser clipping extension
  • Improve database field sorting for content containing emojis
  • Improve floating editor content synchronization
  • Improve Move auto fill search keyword
  • Improve Ctrl+X of inline elements
  • Support entering the sub-menu by pressing Enter
  • Improve Optimize typography for inline math
  • Supports displaying serving IP on Harmony NEXT
  • Improve rollback doc to avoid ID duplication
  • Generate file history before converting doc to heading/moving blocks
  • Improve pasting formulas from Claude
  • Database asset field support keyboard operation
  • Improve query embed block auto refresh
  • Restart the plugin after the marketplace plugin package is updated
  • Supports assets settings on mobile

Abolishment

  • No longer support Android 7
  • No longer support iOS 14

Bugfix

  • Delete exception at the end of inline element
  • Flashcard management will be incorrectly highlighted after global search
  • Exception after pasting embed block
  • Cannot long press to paste on mobile devices
  • Unable to paste specific text copied from WPS
  • The URL link customized by the plugin does not work
  • Formula blocks in super blocks are not displayed completely when exporting to PDF

Refactor

  • Refactor setCurrentById of Outline func scroll policy
  • Upgrade to Electron v34.3.3

Development

  • Improve kernel API /api/filetree/getPathByID
  • Plugin API supports opening block attribute panel by block id
  • Missing switch-protyle or loaded-protyle-static Event on Mobile Back Navigation
  • Add a kernel API /api/block/batchUpdateBlock

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub
